item.title: [Paper Presentation] Shape Registration in Implicit Spaces Using Information Theory and Free Form Deformations
item.description: This talk covers a classical method for shape registration using approaches from information theory and deformations.

item.title: Dealing with Missing Modalities in Medical Images What's Missing?
item.description: A talk regarding the current state-of-art in handling missing inputs for segmentation or classification problems.

item.title: Evaluating Machine Translation Systems using Weighted Vote of Different Scoring Metrics
item.description: We propose a novel multi-metric voting scheme for evaluating machine translation systems.

item.title: Offline Handwritten Signature Verification using Zernike Moments
Automatic Characterization of Breast Masses using NSGA-II based Feature Selection
item.description: Propose a new feature extraction and selection method using NSGA-II for classifying masses as benign or malignant.
